nodes.text: In 0 ABY, three members of the Rebel Alliance's Rogue Flight—Wedge Antilles, Tycho Celchu, and Wes Janson—were sent by General Jan Dodonna on a mission to Kwenn Space Station to gather information on seldom-used hyperlanes, as the Rebels were in search of a new base.

Aboard the station, the three Rogues witnessed Imperial stormtroopers seizing the Action VI transport Stellar Manx and decided to investigate. One of the trio managed to rescue the freighter's crew, and when the Imperials took their hijacked ship out into space, the same Rogue was able to board it and steer it safely back toward the station.

Although the Rogues were dismayed to learn that a number of the station's outbound trade routes through the Outer Rim had been altered by the Empire, they also learned about Imperial plans on the planet Bonadan, which prompted the crew of the Millennium Falcon to go investigate.
